extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest updates to the SMA1000 appliance to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to AMC and CMC
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to the Appliance Management Console (AMC) and Central Management Console (CMC) to only trusted networks.

affected_products: SMA1000 appliance: All firmware versions up to 12.4.3-02804
